description: A soft-toned wooden Gedeckt of 8' or 4' pitch. Williams says: �Stillgedeckt
examplesDescription: Osiris contains 4 dozen examples of Stillgedeckt at 16' and 8' pitch, and one example of Still Flute. No examples of Quiet Gedackt are known, which is mentioned only by Skinner. Contributions welcome.

examples.name: Still Flute 4', Pedal; Jefferson Avenue Presbyterian Church, Detroit, Michigan, USA; Skinner 1925.
